title: Jump Color
description: Bounce the ball on left or right wall and don't let to fall down. Collect the stars to get extra points and increase your highscore!
instructions: Click on your left mouse button or touch the screen and bounce the ball.

title: Galactic War
description: Galactic War is a game which includes past and future at the same time, it has high quality graphics and sounds with old style. You have never played a space shooter, shoot'em up, bullet hell, arcade game which has unique features as Galactic War has. ...world's most addicting space shooter game ever...
instructions: WASD or arrow keys to move the ship mouse for the rest

title: Zoo Pinball
description: Travel in time to a dusty pinball saloon! Hear the sounds of the metal ball hitting the bouncers and observe the score going up! We give you the super real experience of the pinball game, right on the browser of your phone! This pinball table has a ZOO theme. Aim the ball into the jaws of the mighty lion, tiger or hippo to score loads of points.
instructions: Tap left or right on the screen to use the flippers and swipe before playing to shoot the ball.

title: Hammer Master
description: Are you want to be a hammer master who could fix anything? To be that, you need a good nail skill. Let us start exercise! Slide to move the hammer. Drive all nails which have the same color. When the energy is full, you will boost a magic ability. Do not knock the rock, you will die! In the end, let us count how many nails you have driven.
instructions: slide to move

title: Face Paint Party! Girls Salon
description: The costume party that you got invited tonight has an awesome face paint theme! Can you wow the crowd with your creativity by creating the perfect face paint costume? The face paint party that you’re going to tonight is going to be so much fun, but the fun really starts before the party. You’ll get to design a fun face painting to show off along with picking out the best outfit to dress up in that matches your design. Some spa facials will do the trick of getting your skin perfected as a canvas for your artistic genius.
instructions: Endless possibilities for FACE PAINT & COSTUME choices in this Face Paint Salon!

title: Reflector
description: Reflector is a puzzle game where you need to put the blocks in a place where they will refract light and reflect to the targets where it should reach. Break the rays and find the target. You have an unlimited number of movements. Play this addictive puzzle game. This game has 40 levels. Pass them all and enjoy.
instructions: Use mouse to play this game or tap on the screen on your mobile devices.

title: Beach Volley
description: Challenging volleyball game with beautiful, minimalist beach theme, really cute sea turtles and challenging AI. Move your turtle to hit the ball. Keep the ball from falling into your own court. First to score 10 wins!
instructions: Challenging volley ball game

title: Paper Animals Pair
description: Paper Animals Pair is a matching game where you need to match two same cards. Click on the cards and they will rotate. Then a picture of a paper animal will be displayed. Remember the pictures with animals and guess them. Pass all levels. As you progress through the game the levels will become more difficult. On some levels you will have many cards to guess. Be focused and win this kids puzzle game with paper animals.
instructions: Tap on the screen to play this game.

title: Face Paint Party!
description: The costume party you've been invited to tonight has an awesome face painting theme! Can you wow the crowd with your creativity by creating the perfect face painting costume? The face paint party you're going to tonight is going to be so much fun, but the fun really starts before the party. You will have to design a fun face paint to show off along with choosing the best outfit to dress up according to your design. Some spa facials will do your perfected skin like a canvas for your artistic genius.
instructions: How to play: • The costume party invitation says it will be a face painting party • No cheating with masks! • Go to the spa for a facial treatment to prepare your skin • It will be fresh and clean for your artistic masterpiece • Design the perfect face paint and apply makeup • Dress up in a matching costume to finish the look • Watch everyone's jaws drop when you get to the party!

title: Element Evolution
description: A fun-placed farm simulation game that collects more resources by planting different crops successfully unlocks new plant varieties and uses the resources you have in your hands to continuously expand your farm-scale and have more Crop you to get more money to unlock more land.
instructions: Tap to merge.

title: Fit Balls
description: Fit Balls is a fun and addictive puzzle game. Pour the ball into the jar,Put all the balls fit in the jar without crossing the top lane to win in this game.Ball overflowed, mission failed.
instructions: Fit All the balls inside the jar

title: Digger Ball
description: You must dig a tunnel for the ball to slide straight down to the target. On the way there may be obstacles in the form of iron or wooden planks. They need to be circumvented by making turns. But keep in mind that the ball will not roll, if the surface of the corridor is horizontal, it is necessary that it goes downhill all the time.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Diamond Painting ASMR Coloring
description: Do you want to see shiny paintings? Put diamonds all over your painting! Colorful diamonds make a perfect painting. To make the painting shinier and more luxurious. Come and finish the paintings!
instructions: Drag to play.

title: Break The Wall 2021
description: Smash the walls, set yourself free from the boring energy of office space, classroom or crowded streets. Breaking walls will make you feel alive and stronger than ever!
instructions: Use up arrow key or left mouse click to run the player.

title: Pixelcraft Differences
description: In the game Pixelcraft Differences you will find a full search for differences on ten fascinating levels with Minecraft characters. Do not get any hints, if you do not have time, start again. The difference found will be marked with a red circle so that you do not return to it. Do not click mindlessly throughout the picture, get a warning. The game Pixelcraft Differences will make you focus and become more attentive, the differences are small, barely discernible, you have to sweat to find them.
instructions: Use mouse or tap on the screen!

title: Fall Days
description: Fall Days: Atlantic Man! Welcome to the Game World! Finish dozens of courses and collect crowns. Be the winner of the day! Buy the costumes and change your image. Race with 10-40 people, be the winner of the race! Join the world of Fall Days. Race with different costumes on different maps! Make the Difference. 10 Maps 20 Uniform Costumes A completely different mechanic is waiting for you!
instructions: WASD + ZQSD & Mobile Touch Control

title: Black Hole Billiard
description: Black Hole Billiard is fun billiard game suitable for all ages. Relaxed Game of Black Hole Billiard is a modern arcade style pool game with single player. If you love a relaxed game of billiard, this is the game for you! In this billiard game you need to put all the red balls into the black hole to clear the level. 11 levels of fun billiard time. Play around and have fun.
instructions: Mouse or tap to play. Click, hold and move to set angle and power. Get all the red balls in the black hole.

title: Color Dots
description: Color Dots is a game in which you need to destroy the dots by clicking on the buttons of the desired color. Make the best possible result. Have fun and enjoy with Color Dots game.
instructions: Use mouse on desktop or touch buttons on your mobile device.

title: Flossy & Jim Whale Tickler
description: Here's a cute whale that you can tickle all day long. Tickle and rub the whale until the bar fills up. Watch as you receive a special response from the whale. With this game, spread the positivity and feel-good vibe with your audience.
instructions: Tickle the cute whale

title: Knock Rush
description: Knock Rush is a new and interesting shooting 3D game. A wide variety of weapons will make you enjoy yourself enough. If you are not satisfied, then customize your own unique weapons. This is also the unique feature of this game, which is more free and creative. Your goal is very simple. Use your weapon to knock down the enemy and pass the level when you reach the end. Are you eager to design your new weapon?
instructions: Tap to shoot.

title: Shaun The Sheep Sheep Stack
description: In Shaun the Sheep Sheep Stack you must stack sheeps up to the window. Launch the sheeps by pulling their pants to catapult each sheep into the air! Stack them as high as you can until you reach the window.
instructions: Click on the pants and move your mouse to set the angle and power.

title: Word Hunter
description: How quickly can you spot the words? Touch and drag the words to highlight them. Expand your vocabulary with words from different domains and industries.
instructions: Hunt for words, expand your vocabulary

title: Conduct THIS!
description: Conduct THIS! is an addictive game of explosive railway action that will challenge your inner conductor.Set in a stunning world, with incredibly simple controls you race against time to bring passengers safely to their destination by commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions in increasingly challenging action-puzzles.As you progress you unlock new trains, gain access to new beautiful and mysterious regions and earn awards.
instructions: Click on trains to start and stop them!

title: Picture Slide
description: A classic picture slide game. Can you complete the puzzles in the shortest amount of time? Solve all kinds of pictures include animals, food, scenery, cities and objects.
instructions: Put the pieces together

title: Samurai Flash
description: It's a fun parkour combat game. This is a cute samurai. Now he has to keep moving forward and kill everyone along the way. Don't be merciless! In addition to upgrading more weapons, you can also upgrade your own strength, have powerful skills, and complete tasks easily!
instructions: Slide to move.

title: Flat Jumper 2
description: Flat Jumper 2 is a free online fun and puzzle game. Flat Jumper 2 is a game in which you need to jump on colored platforms and choose the desired color of the ball.
instructions: Use arrow keys to move, press Space to change color or touch buttons on your devices.

title: Paper Airplane
description: A paper airplane is fun, of course, but what about to actually pilot it? Using pleasant and player-friendly controls try to fly through as many rings as possible and prevent the plane from crashing!
instructions: Tap/click to fly up, release to start the descent.

title: No One Escape
description: No One Escape is an exciting escape game. One of you will change to murder. You need to find a way to get out. Don't be grabbed, it is so scary. Avoid the sight of the murder. When all buttons change to green, the gate will open. Hold on breath, do not be found. Keep moving until you get away!
instructions: Drag or slide to play.

title: Maze Challenge
description: Randomly generate mazes for any occasion. Navigate the red square to the blue square. Unlimited mazes, each are unique and randomly generated with simple controls.
instructions: Navigate the red square to the blue square.

title: Drop Guys: Knockout Tournament
description: Fall Guys Knockout is a very cute multiplayer racing game. You will race with other adorable chicks. There are many different and interesting modes you could choose to play. You have to beat others, Win the champion! I believe you will love this game!
instructions: direction keys to move, space to jump

title: Neon Rocket
description: Neon Rocket is a casual and very fun game. Management is completely unbalanced, the rocket does not want to obey you and in these conditions the flight will be carried out. You must maintain balance by preventing the rocket from crashing into obstacles. But only collecting stars.
instructions: Use arrows keys or touch on your devices.

title: Hospital Kissing
description: Hospital Kissing is a fun girl game where you have to kiss in secret. Hide your kisses from the doctor and other people! Play Hospital Kissing now for amazing fun!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Pin And Balls
description: A casual puzzle simple game, you only need to pull the pins to dredge the colored ball pipe, let the colored ball successfully fell into the bottom of the bucket and the number of standards can be. But there are a lot of obstacles in the pipe that need attention, and they can cost you balls.
instructions: Tap to play.

title: Fruit Blade
description: Young grasshopper, it's time to learn the art of the fruit blade. Slice different kinds of delicious fruits (orange, kiwi, watermelon, and more) to earn experience points.
instructions: Slice delicious fruit with your blade

title: Love Dots
description: Just draw lines or shapes to Make two balls meet at one place and let them love. Will you be able to clear these simple-looking but actually difficult stages?Lets reveal your skills & Imagination to finish levels.
instructions: Draw Lines or Shapes to meet balls at one place.

title: Atari Breakout
description: A classic arcade game with blocks you need to destroy. A ball moves straight around the screen, bouncing off the top and two sides. Choose between the different modes ‘double’,‘cavity’ or ‘progressive’ with each a unique gameplay experience. Double will give you control of two paddles at the same time. Cavity has two paddles, but initially only one ball. The other balls are contained inside walls and can be freed. In the progressive mode the entire wall will come downwards step by step.
instructions: Move the paddle with the keyboard or mouse.

title: Atari Pong
description: Atari Pong is a table tennis-themed arcade game featuring two-dimensional graphics. Move the paddle and win against your opponent. The goal is for each player to reach eleven points before the opponent. Points are earned when one fails to return the ball to the other.
instructions: Use the keyboard or mouse to move the paddles up or down.

title: Atari Missile Command
description: Atari Missile Command is a classic arcade game. The player's six cities are being attacked by an endless wave of ballistic missiles. You must save the cities by fending off enemy attacks. Aim your three cannons a free will and destroy enemy artillery. But that’s not all. Planes drop missiles and mortars, drones with special explosives and evading missiles! With each 10.000 points you will earn a bonus city. When all cities are destroyed it is game-over “the-end”. With each advancing level your points will get a multiplier of x1, x2 or even x3. For each city that survives you will earn 100 points, and for each remaining missile 5 points each.
instructions: Use the mouse to shoot missiles.

title: Falling Gifts
description: Tap and drag the christmas shopping cart sideways. Catch the falling Christmas gifts. Catch the correct xmas gifts from the wish list. Avoid the wrong Christmas items. How high can you score within 60 seconds?
instructions: Catch the falling presents

title: Stacky Run
description: This is a super casual game, without too many complicated designs, it can be opened and played at any time. Collect the bricks and diamonds on the platform, because the bridge between the island and the island needs to be built with bricks. Your goal is to reach the end safely. Are you ready?
instructions: slide or drag to move.

title: Atari Asteroids
description: Atari Asteroids is a space-themed multidirectional shooter arcade game. Control a single spaceship in an asteroid field and watch out for the traversing flying saucers! You must move your spaceship by rotating and using your thrust! Shoot and destroy all asteroids and saucers, but watch out! Asteroids will break into smaller pieces and asteroids that drift will reappear from the sides. Each asteroid will earn 20 to 100 points. And the game will become a lot harder when you reach more points. The big saucer will shoot randomly and poorly, but the small saucer is much more precise! It will also give you 1000 points! Don’t forget to use the Hyperspace feature, but don’t use it too frequently or your ship might crash.
instructions: Use the keyboard to move the ship and shoot the asteroids.

title: Break The Candies
description: Use the Arrow keys to move your candy around, avoid the obstacles, and touch the target to break them all together. 40 levels to play, can you complete all of them? Play now!
instructions: Use the Arrow keys to move the candy around.

title: Lucky Golden Piggies
description: The Piggy Bank, the global symbol for good luck, fertility and prosperity. In this game you are clicking and tapping your way to wealth by merging piggies. Find out what happens when merging two of the same piggy banks. Can you make it to the ultimate golden piggy.
instructions: Click or tap rapidly to fill the grid with piggies. Swipe to merge two of the same piggies on the grid. Let them collect coins to purchase new piggies in the shop. Make sure to collect extra coins by completing the special achievements.

title: Celebrity Guess Bollywood
description: How well do you know A-list celebrities in Bollywood? Spot Bollywood celebrities such as Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, Dev Patel, Salman Khan, Aishwarya Rai and more.
instructions: Do you know your Bollywood celebs?

title: Among U Red Imposter
description: Did you see me kill someone? Have I ever killed anyone? I didn't! I did! Did I? Kill them before they see! Don't let them see you do it! No one thinks the danger is Among U!
instructions: Drag to play.

title: Bicycle Jigsaw
description: Bicycle Jigsaw is a fun online puzzle game. Drag the pieces into right position using mouse. Solving puzzles is relaxing, rewarding, and keeps your brain sharp. You need to spend $1000 to be able to purchase one of the following pictures. You have three modes for each picture from which the hardest mode brings more money. You have a total of 10 pictures.
instructions: Use mouse or tap to screen to play this game!

title: Fun Escape 3D
description: Fun Escape 3D is so interesting. You will join a running race. In this game, you could push down the others, also you could be pushed too. So besides moving obstacles, you also have to keep sure you won't be pushed down the river. It looks so funny, let us start! The further you arrive, the higher score you get.
instructions: slide to move

title: Route Digger 2
description: Route Digger 2 is interesting puzzle game. On the screen you will see a ball of a certain color on the surface of the earth. Underground is a special well in different colors. You will have to make the ball fall into the well with same color. To do this, use your mouse to dig a tunnel underground. A ball rolling along it will fall into the well and you will receive a certain amount of points for this. Have fun!
instructions: Use your mouse to play the game or tap on the screen!

title: Rodeo Riders
description: Do you want to manage a zoo? It sounds cool! But you need to tame some animals. That visitors could have something to watch. I will give you some interesting missions. Further, you run, rarer animals you could meet. Do not upgrade their habitats that you could earn more money.
instructions: joystick to move

title: Find The Differences
description: Can you find the differences between the two pictures quickly? Let me give you a challenge. You need to find all differences in time. With the level increase, the difference will be more. Pay attention to the details. This is a little skill. If you really don't know, click the hints.
instructions: Click to play
